ticket.title: Accessing ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter from console raises exception
ticket.original-body:
This is a new, empty Rails 3 app. My database.yml looks like this:
@@@ development: adapter: sqlite3 database: db/development.sqlite3 pool: 5 timeout: 5000 @@@
Accessing ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter causes it to autoload abstract_adapter.rb, which in turn requires connection_specification.rb. That file then raises an exception for some reason.
@@@ [hongli@Minato rails3.test]$ ./script/rails console Loading development environment (Rails 3.0.0.beta3) irb(main):001:0> ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter NameError: undefined local variable or method `establish_connection' for ActiveRecord::Base:Class from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb:1141:in `method_missing' from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/railtie.rb:49 from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:14:in `instance_eval' from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:14:in `run_load_hooks' from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:14:in `each' from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:14:in `run_load_hooks' from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb:2250 from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/connection_adapters/abstract/connection_specification.rb:2 from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:209:in `require' from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:209:in `require' from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:195:in `load_dependency' from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:523:in `new_constants_in' from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:195:in `load_dependency' from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:209:in `require' from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/connection_adapters/abstract_adapter.rb:12 from (irb):1 @@@

This is a new, empty Rails 3 app. My database.yml looks like this:
@@@ development: adapter: sqlite3 database: db/development.sqlite3 pool: 5 timeout: 5000 @@@
Accessing ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter causes it to autoload abstract_adapter.rb, which in turn requires connection_specification.rb. That file then raises an exception for some reason.

ticket.original-body-html:
This is a new, empty Rails 3 app. My database.yml looks like this:

development:
  adapter: sqlite3
  database: db/development.sqlite3
  pool: 5
  timeout: 5000

Accessing ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter causes it to autoload abstract_adapter.rb, which in turn requires connection_specification.rb. That file then raises an exception for some reason.

[hongli@Minato rails3.test]$ ./script/rails console
Loading development environment (Rails 3.0.0.beta3)
irb(main):001:0> ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter
NameError: undefined local variable or method `establish_connection' for ActiveRecord::Base:Class
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb:1141:in `method_missing'
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/railtie.rb:49
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:14:in `instance_eval'
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:14:in `run_load_hooks'
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:14:in `each'
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/lazy_load_hooks.rb:14:in `run_load_hooks'
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/base.rb:2250
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/connection_adapters/abstract/connection_specification.rb:2
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:209:in `require'
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:209:in `require'
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:195:in `load_dependency'
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:523:in `new_constants_in'
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:195:in `load_dependency'
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:209:in `require'
        from /Users/hongli/Projects/rails/activerecord/lib/active_record/connection_adapters/abstract_adapter.rb:12
        from (irb):1

This is a new, empty Rails 3 app. My database.yml looks like this:
@@@ development: adapter: sqlite3 database: db/development.sqlite3 pool: 5 timeout: 5000 @@@
Accessing ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter causes it to autoload abstract_adapter.rb, which in turn requires connection_specification.rb. That file then raises an exception for some reason.

This is a new, empty Rails 3 app. My database.yml looks like this:

development:

  database: db/development.sqlite3

Accessing ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter causes it to autoload abstract_adapter.rb, which in turn requires connection_specification.rb. That file then raises an exception for some reason.

[hongli@Minato rails3.test]$ ./script/rails console
Loading development environment (Rails 3.0.0.beta3)

version.title: Accessing ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter from console raises exception

version.body: Just out of curiosity: Why are you doing that?
version.body-html: Just out of curiosity: Why are you doing that?
version.title: Accessing ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter from console raises exception

version.body: I get the same error, the plugin acts_as_tsearch is trigging it when using postgresql
version.body-html: I get the same error, the plugin acts_as_tsearch is trigging it when using postgresql
version.title: Accessing ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter from console raises exception

version.body:
It's working fine for me with rails edge.
@@@ ruby ree-1.8.7-2010.01 > ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter => ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter @@@
version.body-html:
It's working fine for me with rails edge.

ree-1.8.7-2010.01 >  ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter
 => ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::AbstractAdapter
